abstract: Indications that Wal-Mart Stores may have taken steps to keep an internal investigation from digging deeper into $24 million in questionable payments may affect how the government decides to proceed against the giant retailer.
snippet: Indications that Wal-Mart Stores may have taken steps to keep an internal investigation from digging deeper into $24 million in questionable payments may affect how the government decides to proceed against the giant retailer.
lead_paragraph: The United States government puts a premium on corporate cooperation in foreign bribery cases, relying on companies to conduct thorough internal investigations and voluntarily disclose any wrongdoing.

headline.main: Weighing the Legal Ramifications of the Wal-Mart Bribery Case

abstract: Carla Ballecer and Karen Gereffi joined Johannes Leonardo, New York, part of WPP, in new posts. Ms. Ballecer becomes a senior copywriter and Ms. Gereffi becomes a senior art director.
snippet: Carla Ballecer and Karen Gereffi joined Johannes Leonardo, New York, part of WPP, in new posts. Ms. Ballecer becomes a senior copywriter and Ms. Gereffi becomes a senior art director.
lead_paragraph: Carla Ballecer and Karen Gereffi joined Johannes Leonardo, New York, part of WPP, in new posts. Ms. Ballecer becomes a senior copywriter and Ms. Gereffi becomes a senior art director. They worked together as a team at R/GA, New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, on accounts like Google, Nike and Walmart.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry

abstract: As Michaels Stores prepares to go public, the company’s chief executive, John B. Menzer, has been connected to the Mexican bribery inquiry facing Wal-Mart Stores.
snippet: As Michaels Stores prepares to go public, the company’s chief executive, John B. Menzer, has been connected to the Mexican bribery inquiry facing Wal-Mart Stores.
lead_paragraph: As Michaels Stores prepares to go public, the company’s chief executive, John B. Menzer, has been connected to the Mexican bribery inquiry facing Wal-Mart Stores.

headline.main: Michaels Stores C.E.O. Connected to Wal-Mart Bribery Case

byline.original: By Peter Lattman and Stephanie Clifford
